amendment.description: To restore funding for programs under the Workforce Investment Act of 1998.

vote.text: Amendment SA 382 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 48. Record Vote Number: 102.

action.text: Amendment SA 382 proposed by Senator Cantwell. (consideration: CR S4368-4369; text: CR S4369) To restore funding for programs under the Workforce Investment Act of 1998.
